casebody.data:
[Civ. No. 807. Fourth Appellate District. May 12, 1933.] LILLIE S. NELSON, Respondent, v. CALIFORNIA CONSTRUCTION COMPANY (a Corporation), Appellant.

*789Ray W. Hays for Appellant.

Farnsworth, Burke & Maddox for Respondent.

CAMPBELL, J., pro tem.

The facts and questions of law involved herein are identical with those in the case of Nelson v. California Construction Co., a Corporation, (Civ. No. 808) this day decided (ante, p. 757 [22 Pac. (2d) 282]), and for the reasons there given the judgment here appealed from is affirmed.

Barnard, P. J., and Jennings, J., concurred.
